vote.title: Authorize a two-year construction services contract, with two one-year renewal options for job order contracting for waterproofing and roofing repairs, replacements, alterations and improvements with Chamberlin Dallas, LLC through The Interlocal Purchasing System Contract No. 21060302 - Not to exceed $4,000,000.00 - Financing:  Capital Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
